title: PBE Level 1, 0 RP and 1 IP
body: I made an account yesterday, and after work decided to log on to check if I have been leveled to 30 yet and been given my IP  and RP. To my dismay, when I logged on I wasn't leveled, but for some reason recieved 1 IP? Any idea whats going on?

replies.body: Sometimes there's a bit of a delay in adding the PBE Stipend to your account. If you don't have anything by tomorrow, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll take care of you.
Will do! Thanks for the info.
